text: Theo P. Adams (born April 24, 1966) is a former American football offensive lineman. Originally signed as an undrafted free agent by the Los Angeles Rams, he was part of the inaugural London Monarchs that won the World Bowl '91. Adams later played for the NFL's Seattle Seahawks and Tampa Bay Buccaneers. == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Hawaii Rainbow Warriors football players Category:London Monarchs players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players Category:Frankfurt Galaxy players Category:San Jose SaberCats players Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco Category:Players of American football from California
title: Theo Adams (American football)
